question: The building on the left is located where? <image 1>
description:
The image shows a distinctive white, spiral-shaped building with a continuous ramp that wraps around its exterior. This iconic structure is the Solomon R. Guggenheim Museum, a well-known art museum. The surrounding area includes other buildings, trees, and people walking near the entrance. The architecture and design of the Guggenheim Museum are unique and instantly recognizable. The building on the left side of the image is part of an urban environment with tall structures typical of a major city in North America. The Guggenheim Museum is located in New York City, which is in the United States. Therefore, the building on the left is also located in the United States. 

***START of QUESTION***
The building on the left is located where?
A. the United States
B. the Netherlands
C. France
D. Italy

***END of QUESTION***
